title: Noem urges Americans to carry proof of citizenship as ICE raids intensify
description:
WASHINGTON (TNND) â€” Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Secretary Kristi Noem said Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) might ask Americans for proof of citizenship during enforcement operations.
